alert.note: Alert for Susitna Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 23 at 5:50PM AKST until November 24 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 4 inches and ice accumulations of up to two tenths of an inch. Heaviest snow accumulations north of Talkeetna. * WHERE...Susitna Valley. * WHEN...Until noon AKST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Expect a mix of rain, freezing rain and snow in the lower elevations from Talkeetna south along the Parks Highway. The greatest ice accumulations are expected west of the Parks Highway.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
